name: Korean Chicken
ingredients: 1/4 cup granulated Splenda or equivalent liquid Splenda

instructions.en: Mix all ingredients except the chicken in a small bowl.
Place the chicken in a large ziploc bag and pour in the marinade.
Place in a pan (in case of leaks) and marinate 4 hours or overnight, turning the bag occasionally.
Grill the chicken or bake in a greased 9x13" baking pan at 350ยบ for 45-60 minutes, or until done to your liking.

notes: Makes 5 servings. Can be frozen. Don't discard the drippings in the pan, they are good served over the meat.
